data.title: Rolo Tomassi and Lite tapped as support for sleepmakeswaves' Australian tour
data.meta_description: Sheffield, UK-based mathcore unit Rolo Tomassi and Japan's Lite will provide support for Australian post-rock band sleepmakeswaves on their upcoming Australian tour celebrating the 10th year anniversary of the band'...
data.text:
Sheffield, UK-based mathcore unit Rolo Tomassi and Japan's Lite will provide support for Australian post-rock band sleepmakeswaves on their upcoming Australian tour celebrating the 10th year anniversary of the band's sophomore album Love Of Cartography his October.

10/02 Perth, AUS @Magnet House

10/03 Adelaide, AUS @ The Gov

10/04 Melbourne, AUS @ Max Watts

10/05 Brisbane, AUS @ The Brightside Outdoor

10/06 Sydney, AUS @ Opera House (The Studio)
